content.title: New Update - ALPHA 0.3.13
content.creator:
JRedenius
March 13, 2023
content.content:
Added
Added damage indicator to NPCs that are struck.
Armor and Weapons can now be equipped (they don't affect stats yet).
Added day/night indication.
Added weather indicators.
Added moon phases - this will be used to drive horde activity.
New accounts can now be created.

Changed
Implemented improved data storage systems.

content.title: new version Alpha 0.2.20
content.creator:
JRedenius
February 20, 2023
content.content:
New version release today. This release focuses on inventory management. 
Added
Inventory sorting with drag-and-drop added.
Added inventory item dropping with partial count support.
Hidden stash bags added.
Added inventory management between bags.
NPC health added.
Change Log added.
Changed
Updated invetory background textures for faster loading.
Fixed and issue with resource script initial loading.
